// This file is auto-generated. Do not edit manually.
// Structure: Array
#pragma once
#include <array>
#include <cstdint>

class my_data
{
    static constexpr std::array<int8_t, 5> entries = {
        -128, -1, 0, 1, 127
    };

public:
    static bool contains(const int8_t value)
    {
        if (value < -128 || value > 127)
            return false;

        for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
        {
            if (value == entries[i])
               return true;
        }
        return false;
    }

    static constexpr unsigned int item_count = 5;
    static constexpr int8_t min_value = -128;
    static constexpr int8_t max_value = 127;
};
